context.title: Changelog for Rule: HTML page language is valid

Validity of HTML Lang attribute (#510)","date":"1557245311"},{"commit":"47bfeb4fe93e55f734bbc0ca1424e7e1b2efb543","msg":"Fix some incorrect test cases (#477)","date":"1557222024"},{"commit":"a289b7510c398fc4366f3cf9d6bfc0bbb0c5529f","msg":"chore: rename files and update associations (#489)","date":"1556526852"},{"commit":"1ddc581088aa696b0875510158f2c57dd37c458a","msg":"chore: add unique id to all rules (#478)","date":"1555411093"},{"commit":"d38ab7e2d621f93aa213b0a151893bf3c9934ab8","msg":"chore: WCAG ACT RULES CG Website Update (#437)","date":"1555317646"},{"commit":"d28b6265a33a04bdaf15571065fdb269dd0b9b98","msg":"Add examples of syntactically invalid language attributes (#294)","date":"1539589228"},{"commit":"67612e6946bb33d81830af94e09b7ddba0fa5f50","msg":"chore: Mark all SVG documents and add missing namespaces (#300)","date":"1539172987"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"4a4c852a07221a050d0ab21337db56c8e28de7b6","msg":"Chore: Update test cases format and descriptions (#230)","date":"1535617752"},{"commit":"8f5b2955b4c4d801c789eefdbf48f0ac93c2305c","msg":"fix: links in background were not anchors (#187)","date":"1531472363"},{"commit":"0d0c4dd473a3218d06bb8579aa40ab271719f9e2","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-lang-valid (#109)","date":"1530004020"},{"commit":"4be67b9e078db24f2b08c4dafdadcc12efe1595d","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-has-lang (#107)","date":"1529914392"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"bf051a","name":"HTML page language is valid","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that the `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes of the root element of an HTML page have a valid primary language subtag.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"authors":["Annika Nietzio","Jey Nandakumar"]}
